name: Frööt Lööp
description:
The factory needs your help!

All of the machinery has come apart, and it's up to you to process the food! Use conveyors, juicers and slicers to send the food flying to it's destination! But hurry, thanks to the machines crumbling down, we're already behind schedule, so be quick!

How much can you deliver in the given time limit?

Created by:

- Tobias Heukäufer

- Catriona Barclay

Music by: https://freemusicarchive.org - "Skinwalker" by Shaolin Dub

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
